title: AI Applications in Genomic Medicine: Critical Thinking-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic genomics and medical terminology, general knowledge of AI technologies
context.additional_context: Designed for graduate students in medicine and life sciences, emphasizing the enhancement of AI output evaluation skills through linguistic analysis capabilities.

learning_goals: Students can evaluate the accuracy of AI-generated content in genomics medicine through literature comparison.
Students can critically analyze the limitations and ethical issues of AI in genomic diagnosis and treatment planning.
Students can describe effective utilization strategies for AI tools in medical practice.

resources: Access to genomic medicine-related academic databases

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
